cards.q: Main causes of the American Revolution
cards.a: Taxation without representation, British policies, colonial resistance.
Federalists supported Constitution; Anti-Federalists wanted stronger state power and a Bill of Rights.

Popular sovereignty on slavery; repealed Missouri Compromise line.
